title: Note on Hopf Algebras Hinted by the Cutting Rules
abstract: In this paper we represent the cutting rules for the perturbative unitarity in the language of the Hopf algebras. First, we sketch the axioms of the Hopf algebra and explain them with an example: the Connes-Kreimer Hopf algebra in Zimmermann's sense. Then we construct the Hopf algebras hinted by the circled graphs, the circling rules and the cutting rules. In the appendix, we give an introduction to the cutting rules.
